originalText.text:
As a member who frequents a few Crunch locations, I appreciate how clean and tidy this gym is. From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with a spotless environment that speaks volumes about their commitment to hygiene and well-being.

I also appreciate the incredible staff, particularly Mario Pisano. Mario‚Äôs attentiveness and dedication to providing top-notch customer service are truly remarkable. Whether it‚Äôs offering guidance on equipment usage or simply lending an ear for a quick chat, Mario is always a positive energy.

Glad to be a member!

originalText.text: Best gym I've been to! Top notch customer service, comfortable environment, well maintained and clean. The manager Mario was very informative and thorough. He got me set up with a membership and a personal trainer and I love everything so far!

text.text: Best gym I've been to! Top notch customer service, comfortable environment, well maintained and clean. The manager Mario was very informative and thorough. He got me set up with a membership and a personal trainer and I love everything so far!

originalText.text: I have had the absolute best experience at Crunch 66th St! I love it so much I actually went from using it on ClassPass to being a member today. As a runner and yogi I needed a little more focused strength training to supplement my existing fitness plan and prevent injury. Crunch has definitely made that possible because of the welcoming environment. Charvez always greets me bright and early with a smile. Ryan gave me a super informative personal training session. Mike is another great trainer and he always encourages me when he sees me at the gym. Regina‚Äôs A$$ & ABS class always humbles me. Everyone is always so positive there. A special shout out to Mario, the GM, who was able to secure a sick deal for me. I really can‚Äôt speak more highly of this place. It‚Äôs clean and comfortable and has everything a person needs to crush their workout!

originalText.text:
Make sure to remind your customers to cancel their franchise membership when you ‚Äúupgrade‚Äù them. Honestly I also just feel cheated with your fee structure. It‚Äôs like

$76 prorated first month
$100 join fee
$50 processing fee
$119 you have to pay for the last month up front
$ ‚Ä¶

Just charge me the $180/mo it ends up coming out to.

Oh and no need to remind me that I‚Äôm still paying for the other crunch even though this membership gives me access to all crunches? FYI- he implied it was automatic, anything to make the sale

Thanks bro üôÑ

originalText.text:
One of the managers tried to finesse me with with the pricing. I almost never write reviews but this irked me. I tried to ask for a No committment 1 month since I would be traveling for a while and asked the pricing for this location. He gave me a price and said ‚ÄúJust for you, no extra charge I‚Äôll throw in a package that allows access to all gyms‚Äù and that this deal expires today which seemed sketchy‚Ä¶

Then I went ahead to check out another crunch location nearby and asked about the membership. That manager was very straightforward and gave me all the options, day/week/month. He also mentioned that there‚Äôs a 1 month no committment if I just picked that location but this was cheaper than what the original manager told me.

I was then told that I was given the price for access to all gyms not for that location so this guy tried to act all nice and seem like he was hooking me up with a good deal meanwhile he was trying to get me to pay the highest amount‚Ä¶

Always compare prices with other locations or on the website cause people like this will try to finesse you. I get it‚Äôs a sales job but damn I despise those type of ppl who aren‚Äôt transparent‚Ä¶
